text: ālahi kemi’iminani nefisochachewinina genizebochachewini geneti le’inesu bicha yalachewi bemeẖoni gezachewi፡፡ be’ālahi menigedi layi yigadelalu፡፡ yigedilalumi፤ yigedelalumi፡፡ betewirati be’īnijilina bek’uri’animi (yetenegerewini) tesifa be’irisu layi āregaget’e፡፡ ke’ālahimi yebelet’e bekīdanu yemīmola manewi bezīyami be’irisu beteshashat’achihubeti shiyach’achihu tedesetu፡፡ yihimi irisu talak’i ‘idili newi፡፡
